segments.text: The water from the sink is really spreading now.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's no longer just a puddle; it's a small flood.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can see it reflecting the light from the window.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This is going to cause some serious water damage.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Those wooden cabinet doors are soaking wet, poor things.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And the floorboards, they'll warp if this continues much longer.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's such a waste of water too, just running away.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Someone is going to have a very big cleanup on their hands.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The thought of discovering such a mess makes me cringe.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a shame to see such a functional space become so compromised.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: All while an adult is completely oblivious, it's quite infuriating.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The juxtaposition with the orderly garden is increasingly stark.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This kitchen is slowly turning into a swamp.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a bit helpless just watching it happen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The entire scene just feels like a brewing disaster.
segments.speaker: PAR
